name: BOOC
description:
You are a berserker getting swarmed by enemies - but their attacks don't hurt you, they only make you angrier, bigger and stronger. However, that orbital cannon shooting at you - that you can't withstand, and as you grow more rage, it's getting more difficult to avoid it. Try to survive as long as you can and take as many enemies down with you as possible.

WSAD to move, Spacebar or J to attack.

Developed in 48h for GMTK Game Jam. 

Music by De_Fault:
https://soundcloud.com/aether620
https://twitter.com/aether620
https://aether620.itch.io/
